name: Forj
intro: Creating unique fan experiences for creators
introduce: Forj delivers leading Web3 products and technologies that create unique fan experiences for creators. A truly end-to-end solution, Forj is the next frontier of fan engagement through its use of NFTs, metaverse protocols, and blockchain tech to bring fans closer to their favorite creator brands in Music, Entertainment, Gaming and beyond. Forj-owned brands include metaverse infrastructure project Metaprints and leading GameFi project PolkaPets.
